title: I CANT SEE GAME CHAT WHEN IM IN A GAME HELP
body: I cant even see my chat and i went on youtube but it didnt help i have 0.0.0.53 only pls help

replies.body:
You might have accidentally dragged the chat off the screen, but there's also a chance that something went wrong with your config files. Let's reset those config files really quickly following these steps, test it out in a practice/custom match and let me know if it fixes it!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
